Magalie Chetrit

I'm Magalie, a web developer.

I have been working as a developer for over 20 years. This year, I worked as a contractor in the Retail Experience team to develop an internal campaign planning application for McDonald's. Recently I managed and maintained all the Happy Meal websites in the world. Before that, I worked on the development of McDonald's Project "As Featured in".

Read more

I also worked on TopGear, NewScientist, I have helped developers at Intel Corp with their proprietary software, I've worked with SAP's Hybris. My experiences range from large to small projects, dealing with over millions monthly pageviews, A11y, SEO and projectmanagement.

NowNowNow

Last updated: December 2025

This is a list of what I am doing right now. What I am working and focusing on. I took my inspiration from nownownow.com to create this section. And also: Herman. Below you will find some of the projects I have recently closed.

Current projects.

What I am working on right now:

  • Modem.Work - Maintenance and update from Kirby 3 to Kirby 5.
  • maggiematters.com - A personal project. Documentation of my life with cancer. I'm experimenting with Google Analytics, WordPress Theme TwentyTwentyFive and technical SEO.
  • ErikKorte.nl - Refactoring and rebuilding a WordPress site for a Dutch funeral home. Including a custom plugin for creating and managing condolances.
  • farbest.com - A custom wordpress plugin to filter ingredients.
  • haymumford.com - Webhosting, DevOps and Maintenance.
  • navesink.digital - A personal project - helping individuals and businesses organize their digital life.
  • navesinkwebsolutions.com - Owner of a small digital agency in New Jersey.

Courses, Books, Volunteering.

  • TNBCThrivers - Volunteering as moderator for Metastatic TNBC Chats and community support.
  • Volunteering with WordPress - Recently, I volunteer 4 - 8 hours a week to WordPress's Accessibility, Docs and CSS team. I help with bug scrubs, documentation, join meetings. This is my WP profile
  • Course: Fundamentals of Building AI Agents
  • Book: First Principles: What America's Founders Learned from the Greeks and Romans and How That Shaped Our Country
  • Book: Why We Sleep: Unlocking the Power of Sleep and Dreams

Previously closed projects.

  • happymeal.com - developing and guiding migration to a WordPress project that supports a 100+ locales
  • mcdonaldsasfeaturedin.com - A shortlived campaign for McDonald's in WordPress, WPML, Timber and ACF
  • ArtEZPress Shop - A custom theme I built in WooCommerce with custom API connection to a WMS
  • Modem.Work - A portfolio for MIT Architects built in Kirby CMS.
  • TopGear.com - WordPress Theme Development and Supports

...and more work can be found in my resume or my linkedin.
